The MBDA, which, in particular, produced the winged Taurus rockets, stated that Taurus was readily renewed.

He reported itinterviewAugsburger Allgemeine by the head of the German division of MBDA, Thomas Gotschild.

According to him, Taurus refers to modern military weapons, but the transfer of such missiles of Ukraine is a political issue.

"Currently, Ukraine is using other types of weapons in the confrontation. From the point of view of Ukrainians, Taurus could become an important additional component in the current situation. But I repeat: it is not our responsibility to make a decision on the delivery of Taurus to Ukraine. This is a political decision," said Thomas Gottschild.

At the same time, he stressed that there are opportunities for renewal of Taurus production in the company.

“Taurus production line, equipment and corresponding halls are still in place. We can start production of Taurus at any time. But for this we will need a new order for this weapon, ”Thomas Gotshild emphasized.

Earlier, MBDA at the plant in Schrobenhausen, Upper Bavaria, produced about 600 Taurus cruise missiles for the German army.

As reported by the Armyinform, the United KingdomsuggestedGermany is a variant of supplies to Ukraine long -range missiles.
